original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebraBisStable. - intros (a1, b1) (a2, b2) Hab12. destruct Hab12 as [Ha Hb]. split. + intros (a3, b3) (a4, b4) (Join_ab12_a3b3, Join_ab12_a4b4). destruct (Ha (a1, b1) (a2, b2) Join_ab12_a3b3) as ((a1', b1') & (a2', b2') & Hab1' & Hab2' & Hab12'). destruct (Hb a1' b1' a2' b2' Hab1' Hab2') as (Ha1' & Hb1'). exists (a1', b1'), (a2', b2'). auto. + intros (a3, b3) (a4, b4) (Join_ab12_a3b3, Join_ab12_a4b4). destruct (Hb a1 b1 a2 b2 Join_ab12_a3b3) as ((a1', b1') & (a2', b2') & Hab1' & Hab2' & Hab12'). destruct (Ha (a1, b1) (a2, b2) Hab1' Hab2') as (Ha1' & Hb1'). exists (a1', b1'), (a2', b2'). auto. - intros (a, b) (c, d) (Join_ac, Join_bd). split. + intros (e, f) (g, h) (Join_ac_ef, Join_bd_gh).
